p: The phenolic acid extraction was performed using our previous work method with some modification (Hazrati et al., 2019). Briefly, 10 ml of 80% ethanol was added to 1.0 g of the dried powdered plant, vigorously shaked, and centrifuged at a speed of 12,000 rpm for 10 min. The collected supernatant was evaporated and stored at –20°C for further analysis.
